name: neon looper
description:
Application Description:
This is a cheerful and melodious casual game where your sense of rhythm and rhythm will be tested.Once you start, you can’t stop.Try it if you don't believe it.

Each time you tap the screen, a dazzling sound is released, along with the increasingly complex rhythm. If your timing is not good, the sound will collide and the level will fail. And if you grasp the right time, you will get a little satisfaction from the rhythm of the cycle.

The game contains hundreds of unique levels that can completely release and satisfy your challenge desires.
